post.description: Registers a new user and returns user details along with an authentication token.
Logs in a user with email and password and returns an auth token.

401.description: Unauthorized - Auth token missing or invalid

post.description: Creates a new translation entry with key, locale, content, and tag.

get.description: Retrieves a single translation record by its ID.

content.example: Nostrum illo quo esse et magni rem cupiditate.

put.description: Updates the specified translation entry by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the translation to update

delete.description: Deletes the specified translation by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the translation to delete

get.description: Exports translations based on the given locale and optional tag.
